metadata.title: Word Formation - Single Sentences
metadata.description: Individual sentences with word transformations - 10 items per set - Cambridge Format

sentences.text: He deserves (0) RECOGNISE recognition for all the work he's done over the years for local charities.
The company's decision showed complete REGARD .......... for employee safety.
She couldn't go out yesterday evening; she had to stay home and look after her younger RELATE ..........
After days of SEARCH .........., they finally found the missing documents.
His SUCCEED .......... in the competition surprised everyone, including himself.
That young lady is very CONSCIENCE .......... in her work and always meets deadlines.
TROPICS .......... plants are very difficult to grow in the UK climate.
The news came as such a shock that they were both SPEECH ..........
I thought the whole evening was very ENJOY ..........
She didn't get the job because she lacked the right QUALIFY ..........
The line was (0) ENGAGE engaged when she tried to phone her parents this morning.
You'd like to speak to Mr Smith? That's EXTEND .......... 342.
We got cut off because she was calling from a public phone and her SUBSCRIBE .......... ran out.
The storm was so bad that most telephone POLE .......... in the area were blown down.
The new software offers excellent CONNECT .......... between all devices.
You're playing a very DANGER .......... game with your personal data.
There was a terrific EXPLODE .......... and then the whole building collapsed.
He said 'Good morning' in a most FRIEND .......... way.
My teacher COURAGE .......... me to take the examination.
This skirt is too short, so I must have it LONG ..........
A list will be sent on (0) APPLY application to the manager.
Archaeologists located the walls at a DEEP .......... of several metres below the surface.
There were scenes of great EXCITE .......... when the results were announced.
They must accept the DECIDE .......... of the court.
It should always be possible to make a COMPLAIN .......... against a government official.
There was no NECESSARY .......... for them to make two separate journeys.
This dog has been trained to be completely OBEY .......... to his master.
If the FEAR .......... of enough people were strong, there would never be war.
To guarantee ADMIT .......... to the course you should apply very early.
Her suitcase seemed NECESSARY .......... heavy for such a short trip.
(0) CONVERSE Conversation has been destroyed by television.
The two political parties have OPPOSE .......... attitudes to the problem.
The boy's BEHAVE .......... improved as he grew older.
I made him APOLOGY .......... for being so rude.
Everybody in this NEIGHBOUR .......... works at the local factory.
There is a BELIEVE .......... that life exists on other planets.
Although his visit was EXPECT .........., we made him welcome.
Since he was well trained, winning the race was COMPARE .......... easy.
I should like to hear a VARY .......... of opinions on this matter.
In his ANXIOUS .......... to be understood, he spoke slowly and very loudly.
(0) THROUGH Throughout his working life he has been saving for a voyage round the world.
Her writing is very bad. I can't even read her SIGN ..........
All classes BEGIN .......... in January will end in April.
You should pack the glasses carefully to avoid BREAK ..........
After most children had gone, the house was COMPARE .......... quiet.
The cat examined the new food SUSPECT ..........
Now she is earning money she feels more DEFEND ..........
The arrested man could give no EXPLAIN .......... of his actions.
It is really ORDINARY .......... that we two cousins have never met before.
The results of the examination were very SATISFY ..........
When people protest they organize a (0) DEMONSTRATE demonstration.
They meet and shout and wave banners and applaud their LEAD ..........
They CHEER .......... march long distances in all weathers.
If necessary, they fight for their BELIEVE ..........
If trouble breaks out, they may be arrested and even PRISON ..........
Yet it is DOUBT .......... how much good all this really does.
They frequently MOBILE .......... the traffic as they march through the streets.
They cause trouble and IRRITATE .......... to pedestrians and police.
The result is that people become SYMPATHY .......... to their cause.
PUBLIC .......... for the movement has declined in recent months.
The housing (0) SHORT shortage in London is one of the most pressing problems.
The number of HOME .......... people increases daily.
However, as yet there seems no satisfactory SOLVE ..........
The lack of ACCOMMODATE .......... at affordable rents is a disgrace.
The ERECT .......... of vast office blocks occupies valuable space.
Such blocks are frequently left OCCUPY ..........
The MISERABLE .......... of those who have nowhere to live is ignored.
Converting buildings into flats would be PROFIT .......... for property owners.
Local people must form Housing ASSOCIATE .......... to help themselves.
The government's RESPOND .......... to the crisis has been inadequate.
Now they have all day to do the (0) NUMBER numerous things they never had time for before.
But the prospect of free time seems to discourage them COMPLETE ..........
This is because they are PREPARE .......... for it.
If elderly people want to enjoy leisure, they must make proper PROVIDE ..........
Whatever they are INTEREST .......... in, now is the time to enjoy it.
GARDEN .........., bird-watching, painting - they must plan well in advance.
Many retirees find great SATISFY .......... in volunteer work.
Physical ACTIVE .......... is important for maintaining health in retirement.
Some people experience LONELY .......... after leaving the workplace.
Proper financial PREPARE .......... ensures a comfortable retirement.
Recently (0) SCIENCE scientists have become extremely worried about the world's population.
The problem is particularly acute in the DEVELOP .......... countries.
Natural resources are becoming ADEQUATE .......... for the increasing population.
ENVIRONMENT .......... damage is accelerating at an alarming rate.
Many species face EXTINCT .......... due to habitat loss.
TECHNOLOGY .......... advances offer some hope for sustainable solutions.
COOPERATE .......... between nations is essential to address these challenges.
CONSUME .......... of resources must be reduced dramatically.
PUBLIC .......... awareness campaigns are having some EFFECT ..........
Without URGE .......... action, the consequences will be severe.
The teacher's (0) EXPLAIN explanation was clear and easy to follow.
Student ATTEND .......... has improved since the new policy was introduced.
Her ACHIEVE .......... in mathematics earned her a scholarship.
The course offers excellent PREPARE .......... for university studies.
MOTIVATE .......... is the key factor in successful learning.
The school promotes TOLERATE .......... and respect among students.
Technology has revolutionized EDUCATE .......... in recent decades.
Critical THINK .......... skills are emphasized throughout the curriculum.
The library provides an excellent LEARN .......... environment.
ASSESS .......... methods vary depending on the subject.
